title: A Wicked Whisper Came
description: Valory bar Adrianth, second son of the king, has spent his life traveling Oceana and the Eastern World in his fatherâ€™s name.Arden bar Miran, youngest of the House of Stewards, has lived his life under a name his father didn't give him.But now Oceana is a nation at war. Shadows are spreading from the south. Foul creatures are appearing, some of which were thought to exist only in myth. A nameless evil is pressing upon the borders, its source unknown.Oceana is a nation at war: but they do not know their enemy by name.Valory intends to find the source of this evil. Arden strives to find his place. They did not plan on finding one another. Together they take to the high seas of the Armathian Ocean where they struggle with duty, honor, desire, and the mystery of the spreading shadow.
author: CMTaylor
